name: RinoSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, dim light”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
【Rino smart APP】is the home intelligent control terminal platform of Rinocloud Technology
Through Rino smart APP, various communication technologies, such as WiFi, Bluetooth, NFC, ZigBee, bus, PLC wired, etc., can be quickly distributed to achieve the interconnection of various smart devices.
Covering more than 100+ categories, involving lighting, electricians, appliances, sensors, door locks and etc., easily realize PLC whole house intelligence, Zigbee smart house, ultra-low power Bluetooth panels and other intelligent scenes linkage
By establishing different home space scenes, realize individual control for each scene
Provide custom home scenes creation, you can build your own intelligent control mode according to your own habits.
Provide remote control, timing control, sharing devices and other functions
Compatible with the mainstream smart speakers, enjoy a truly intelligent experience

APP application download address：https://apps.apple.com/app/id6443915080
